name: SALVAGE (itch) (SpectifyyDev)
description:
Please read the README file included. 

Humanity has hit the great filter. As Earth died years ago, the human race moved to the stars. But a series of solar flares destroyed most functioning technology. You are now one of the last to live in space, stuck in a rustbucket spacecraft, you must traverse the wreckage and destroyed remnants of your species as you search and collect supplies, hoping to do nothing more than survive.
